column2: For the next 6 questions please think about your symptoms over the past 7 days...  How often did you have a burning feeling behind your breastbone (heartburn)?
For the next 6 questions please think about your symptoms over the past 7 days...  How often did you have stomach contents (liquid or food) moving upwards to your throat or mouth (regurgitation)?
For the next 6 questions please think about your symptoms over the past 7 days...  How often did you have pain in the center of the upper stomach?
For the next 6 questions please think about your symptoms over the past 7 days...  How often did you have nausea?
For the next 6 questions please think about your symptoms over the past 7 days...  How often did you have difficulty getting a good night's sleep because of your heartburn and/or regurgitation?

For the next 6 questions please think about your symptoms over the past 7 days...  How often did you take additional medications for your heartburn and/or regurgitation other than what your physician told you to take (such as Tums, Rolaids, Maalox)?
